descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#93c47d]OK where do I start...  I used a Teen race mod and it shows. Not really a backstory here other than I stuck her in Bleak Falls Barrow to make it interesting. Still a noob but learning. So let's get this underway...[/color]
[/size]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]STAT'S: [/size][/color]

[url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2upiM][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2upiM.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#93c47d][size=4]AGE: 18[/size][/color]
[color=#93c47d][size=4]Height .095, Weight .50
Health, Magicka, Stamina -  500
Speed=150
Weapons: Two crappy daggers.
Basic Armor: Forsorn[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]MORE STATS: [/size][/color]
[url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2upqM][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2upqM.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#93c47d][size=4]SPELLS: Fireball left hand, Frostbite right hand and Chain Lightening.[/size][/color]

[url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2urzi][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2urzi.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]REQUIREMENTS: [/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE By: Groovtama][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions By: HydrogensaysHDT][/url]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]CREDITS:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin 4.0 UNP-CBBE By: HeroedeLeyenda][/url]
[color=#1e84cc]Captivating Eyes[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal By: Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56916/?]Growing Up in Skyrim By:MimiTheAlchemist [/url][color=#00ff00] For The TEEN Race[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77618/?]UNPB Pink Princess Outfit] Perfect teeny outfit! By: gutris1[/url]
[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/]HaloFarm Poses] By: HaloFarm Awesome work!][/url]
[url=http://enbdev.com/]Boris Vorontsov's ENB][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]Real Vision By: SkyrimTuner][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?] Make A Follower Kit MAFK by Ashes2Asherz][/url][color=#00ff00] I STILL USE from time to time when I'm LAZY.

[/color][color=#ffff00][size=4]TOOLS:[/size][/color]
[color=#93c47d][size=4]Creation Kit
NifScope
NifMerge
BSA Unpacker
Textblend
Zillions Of Tutorials
[/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]RECOMMENDED:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks By: Dheuster][/url]
[color=#00ff00]NOTE: Please be sure to put this UNDER any follower mods or conflicts can arise.[/color]

[color=#00ff00]The Manipulator (Google) Great tool for Making/Un-Making followers Essential, No Naked comments Hack etc[/color].


[color=#ffff00][size=4]PEACE OUT!![/size][/color]
[url=http://funkyimg.com/view/2urHT][img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2urHT.jpg[/img][/url]
